title: Drawing, "Design for Plate with Fish and Shell", ca. 1923
signed: Signed in graphite, lower right:  FD
inscribed: Label affixed to verso of cardboard:  GALLERIA D'ARTE CORTINA DI RENZO 20121 MILANO (ITALIA) PIAZZA CAVOUR CORTINA/TEL. 66 7705 6595644; typed on label:  FORTUNATO DEPERO/STUDIO PER...UN' OPERA/ 1918/1925
provenance: Galleria d'arte Cortina di Renzo Cortina, Piazza Cavour 1, Milan
description: One quadrant of circular design with three interlocked fish and small shell at lower left.  Ruled lines form triangles above and below.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Plate with Fish and Shell", ca. 1923.
ca. 1923. Graphite on white paper, lined. Gift of Elaine Lustig Cohen. 2000-20-15.
